diff_hunk:
@@ -283,7 +283,7 @@ def remove_prefix(text, prefix):
                 return text[len(prefix):]
             return text
         munged_id = remove_prefix(self.id(), "__main__.")

body: Without it, we always place expect files in the same place as `test/common.py` We don't want this for onnx-pytorch tests, which don't live in the PyTorch test directory.
